headline: Citi Hires BlackRock’s Kate Moore as Wealth Division CIO Amid Revamp
summary: The former head of thematic strategy for BlackRock’s global allocation team will join Citi’s wealth business as chief investment officer.

headline: BlackRock’s Martin S. Small to Present at the 2024 Goldman Sachs US Financial Services Conference on December 10th
summary: NEW YORK, November 26, 2024--BlackRock, Inc. (NYSE:BLK) today announced that Martin S. Small, Chief Financial Officer, is scheduled to speak at the 2024 Goldman Sachs US Financial Services Conference on December 10th, 2024, beginning at approximately 2:20 p.m. ET. A live webcast will be accessible via the "Investor Relations" section of BlackRock’s website, www.blackrock.com. A replay of the webcast will be available within 24 hours of the presentation and will remain accessible through the Comp

headline: Strategic ETF Allocations: Enhancing Income, Diversification, And Reducing Risks In Your Dividend Portfolio
